org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.readers.def
Class AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.readers.def.AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeCopyOperationStrategyMatcher
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeWSBPELSpecStrategyMatcher
public class AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeCopyOperationStrategyMatcher

Creates specs or prototype objects for the commmon and variants and maps them to the strategy names. Subclasses are available that add additional variants for the particular version of bpel.

Nested Class Summary
protected static class AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher.AeBaseVarSpec
          Base class for the specs, provides base impl of a spec matcher along with constants and a BitSet to record which values are enabled in the from or to def.
protected static class AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher.AeFromSpec
          Extension to the base spec that adds specs for the AeFromDef;
protected static class AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher.AeToSpec
          Creates a spec for the given spec
